short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Automate your Canva or Photopea designs with variables. A helpful tool for print on demand businesses.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
AutoMate by AutomatePOD revolutionizes content creation by seamlessly integrating with Canva and Photopea. With its dynamic text replacement feature using variables, users can effortlessly generate personalized and customizable designs, saving valuable time and effort in the process.

With version 3, we've completely rebuilt the extension from the ground up. Built with future expansion in mind, the Automate POD extension will be easier than ever to use, and will only grow with new and exciting functionality.

Changes in v3.2.1:

- Various bug fixes and optimizations.
